Headline: #87 Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 87th/Commercial
ShortDescription: Eastbound 87 buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Commercial, 90th, Buffalo and 91st due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #87 buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Commercial, 90th, Buffalo and 91st due to street blockage.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
